data.actual_result: Your friends doesn't seems to be present, as if they mysteriously disappeared.
data.expected_result: You should see your friends in the list.
data.short_description: Group DM doesn't shows Friends List, but Instead Says No Friends to Add! (Original Reporter: Zorkian#0001)
data.steps_to_repro: - Join or create a group DM - Click on the group DM name. - Click on Add Friends to Group DMs. - Observe
